Posts.Content: Pamjenn wrote: I was diagnosed 3.5 weeks ago at age 46 with Invasive ductal carcinoma, surgery is tomorrow morning and if I said I wasn't scared I'd be fibbing! This last few weeks I've gone through all the emotions....devestation, sadness and now anger. I just want this lump out and I want to get on with whatever treatment is thrown at me.....the waiting is horrible. Will I know anything more after surgery or do I have to wait again?
